name: analyse-1
description: Site web d'Analyse 1 de S. Friedli

scripts.build: npm-run-all delete-old-build create-dir html fonts js-css && echo "Build complete!"
scripts.js-compress: uglifyjs js/main.js -c -m -o dist/js/main.min.js --source-map "base='dist/js',content=inline,includeSources=true,url='main.min.js.map'" & uglifyjs js/main-semestre.js -c -m -o dist/js/main-semestre.min.js --source-map "base='dist/js',content=inline,includeSources=true,url='main-semestre.min.js.map'"
scripts.create-dir: mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p dist/css && mkdir -p dist/js && mkdir -p dist/css/fonts
